info.name: Disability Pride Flag [194 Ch]
info.description:
golf welcome

designed for 1920x1080 resolution, do u = (u+u-R)/R.y * rot(atan(R.y/R.x)) and int(3.5*u.y+3.5) otherwise

renderpass.code:
#define V vec3

void mainImage( out vec4 o, vec2 u )
{
    V R = iResolution,
      g;

    o.rgb = .35
          + V[](g,            // grey
                V(46,9,15),   // red
                V(58,52,12),  // yellow
                V(57),        // white
                V(13,41,52),  // blue
                V(-12,33,14), // green
                g)            // grey            
            [clamp(int((3.4*u.x + 6.*u.y - 1.7*R.x)/R.y + .5), 0, 6)] / 1e2;
}
renderpass.name: Image
